content: युवन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [यौतीति युवा, यु-कनिन् <ls>Uṇ. 1. 154</ls>] (युवतिः --ती or यूति {%<ab>f.</ab>%}; <ab>compar.</ab> यवीयस् or कनीयस्; <ab>superl.</ab> यविष्ठ or कनिष्ठ) {@--1@} Young, youthful, adult, arrived at puberty. {@--2@} Strong, healthy. {@--3@} Excellent, good. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} (<ab>nom.</ab> युवा, युवानौ, युवानः, <ab>acc.</ab> <ab>pl.</ab> यूनः, <ab>instr.</ab> <ab>pl.</ab> युवभिः &c.) {@--1@} A young man, a youth; सा यूनि तस्मिन्नभिलाषबंर्धं शशाक शालीनतया न वक्तुं <ls>R. 6. 81.</ls> {@--2@} A younger descendant (the elder being still alive); जीवति तु वंश्ये युवा <ls>P. IV. 1. 163</ls>; <ls n="P.">I. 2. 65</ls>, <ls n="P.">II. 4. 58</ls>, <ls n="P.">IV. 1. 90.</ls>
